sentences.sContent: Genius is nothing but labor and diligence.
sentences.sContent_eng: Genius is nothing but labor and diligence.
sentences.sCn: 天才无非是工作和勤奋。

sentences.sContent: We should cultivate the good habits of diligence and frugality.
sentences.sContent_eng: We should cultivate the good habits of diligence and frugality.
sentences.sCn: 我们要养成勤俭节约的好风气。

words.tran: 勤勉的；用功的，费尽心血的
